toastWarning.message: Firefox Private Network needs your attention!

viewError-otherInUse.message: You cannot use Firefox Private Network because you are using a custom proxy setting.

viewError-proxyAuthFailed.message: Your connection was dropped. Try turning Firefox Private Network on again.

viewError-proxyError.message: Your connection was dropped. Try turning Firefox Private Network on again.

viewLoginMessage.message: Sign in to your Firefox account to start using Firefox Private Network

viewMainActive.message: Your connection is secure, and your location is hidden from websites and trackers, making it tougher for those annoying targeted ads to track you online.

viewMainInactive.message: Using public Wi-Fi without a secure connection can put you at risk for identity theft, snooping, and malware infection.

viewOffline.message: You are offline. Check your network connection and try again.
